statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - x + 4 , 6 \, x^{3} + 24 \, x^{2} - 18 \, x + 9 , 3 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x - 1 , -2 \, x^{3} - 8 \, x^{2} + 6 \, x - 3 , 5 \, x^{3} + 27 \, x^{2} - 19 \, x + 13\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
